alert.note: Alert for Butler; Harvey; Marion; McPherson; Reno; Saline; Sedgwick (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 12 at 10:31PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern McPherson, eastern Reno, northern Sedgwick, Harvey, northwestern Butler, Marion and southeastern Saline Counties through 1130 PM CDT... At 1031 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Tampa to 6 miles east of Hutchinson. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hutchinson, Newton, Mcpherson, Park City, Valley Center, Hesston, Hillsboro, South Hutchinson, Halstead, Marion, North Newton, Moundridge, Sedgwick, Inman, Buhler, Haven, Peabody, Burrton, Galva and Mount Hope. This includes Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 17 and 67. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for south central and central Kansas.

area.areaDesc: Butler; Harvey; Marion; McPherson; Reno; Saline; Sedgwick
